description: This easy minestrone soup requires less ingredients than most but is still packed with Italian flavour.
name: Light Minestrone Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large carrots, peeled and finely chopped
2 sticks celery, peeled and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pan on medium high heat and cook the onion, carrot and celery for 10 minutes. Add the garlic, tomato puree and herbs and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in the chopped tomatoes, stock and pasta and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes.
Stir in the kale and half the parmesan and cook for 2 minutes to wilt the kale.
Divide between 4 bowls, top with the rest of the parmesan and serve.
